BuffData.DynamicTooltip: <titleLeft>Carrion Renewal</titleLeft><mainText>Swain restores <font color='#44DDFF'>@f1@</font> Mana (9 + 1 per level) whenever he kills an enemy unit. On Champion kill or assist, he restores <font color='#44DDFF'>@f2@</font> Mana instead (9% of his Maximum Mana).</mainText>
